Проголосуйте за наиболее близкий вам отв: Choose a worldview that you like more
Выберите важный для вас вопрос: Choose an important question for you
Здесь вы можете сделать пожертвование на: Here you can make a donation to this and other similar projects that contribute to the study and development of intercultural relations
На важнейшие жизненные вопросы отвечают: The authentic representatives of different religious movements briefly answer humanity’s global questions. Choose an answer based on your first thoughts and reaction. Don’t try to identify and guess the worldview, religion or movement straight away. Once you have made your choice, you will be shortly advised of the outcome.
Выберите ответы, с которыми вы согласны: Choose the answers that you agree
Здесь ваш мировоззренческий выбор обсужд: Here the members of the public, scholars and scientists discuss your choices. Thanks to them you can find out why you made this or that choice, what it means and how it may turn to you.
в этом вопросе мой выбор: in this question my choice is
Посмотрите ответы представителей других: See answers of other worldviews speakers
Здесь вы можете ознакомиться с суммарным: Here you can see total and by question stats of our users worldview choices.
